questions.title: Lessor
questions.question: [Basic Lease Information] What is the lessor's name ?

questions.title: Lessee
questions.question: [Basic Lease Information] What is the lessee's name ?

questions.title: Type
questions.question: What is the type of lease?

questions.title: Address of the premises
questions.question: What is the address of the premises?

questions.title: Size of the premises
questions.question: What is the square footage of the premises?

questions.title: Nature of the premises
questions.question: What is the nature of the rented property? (Here we are looking if it’s land, a building, parking, etc.)

questions.title: Use of the premises
questions.question: What is the intended use of the premises?

questions.title: Lease signing date
questions.question: [Basic Lease Information] What is the date of signing the lease?

questions.title: Commencement date
questions.question: [Basic Lease Information] What is the commencement date of the lease?

questions.title: Duration of the lease
questions.question: [Basic Lease Information] What is the duration of the lease?

questions.title: End date
questions.question: [Basic Lease Information] What is the end date of the lease?

questions.title: Lessee’s termination option
questions.question: Does the lessee have an option to terminate the lease?

questions.title: Renewal conditions
questions.question: What are the conditions for the renewal of the lease?

questions.title: Annual rent
questions.question: What is the annual rent amount?

questions.title: Payment frequency
questions.question: Is the rent payment quarterly?

questions.title: Revision
questions.question: Is the rent subject to revision?

questions.title: Revision index
questions.question: What is the revision index?

questions.title: Security deposit amount
questions.question: What is the amount of the security deposit?

questions.title: Type of guarantee
questions.question: What are the guarantees for rent payment?

questions.title: Lessee change of control
questions.question: Are there any provisions related to the change of control of the lessee?

questions.title: Unrestricted assignment of lease rights
questions.question: Can the lessee transfer the lease without the lessor’s written consent?

questions.title: Lease transfer (to whom)
questions.question: By exception to whom can the lease rights be assigned?

questions.title: Subleasing (yes/no)
questions.question: Can the lessee sublease the premises?

questions.title: Subleasing (to whom)
questions.question: By exception to whom can the premises be subleased without prior authorization from the lessor?

questions.title: Condition of the premises upon return
questions.question: In what condition must the Lessee return the premises?

questions.title: Restoration to original condition
questions.question: Must the premises be restored to their original condition?

questions.title: State of risks and pollution (ERP)
questions.question: Is the statement of risks and pollution annexed to the lease?

questions.title: Energy performance diagnosis
questions.question: Is the Energy Performance Diagnosis or DPE annexed to the lease?

questions.title: Applicable law
questions.question: What is the applicable law?

questions.title: Competent jurisdiction
questions.question: What is the competent jurisdiction?
